body: I was wondering how to become a staff member? I am on the server often, and have reported a number of people? Just wondering if I could have a chance to earn a spot in the Avicus staff?
body_tagged: I was wondering how to become a staff member? I am on the server often, and have reported a number of people? Just wondering if I could have a chance to earn a spot in the Avicus staff?
title: How to become staff?

replies.body:
You can apply here when the applications are open.
They closed 2 days ago, and will re-open soon.

Locking seen as the question has been answered.
